data.name: X Wars Deluxe Demo
data.detailed_description: The first Level of the campaign. And that's it :p No multiplayer, etc. Just a little taste of the real deal.
data.about_the_game: The first Level of the campaign. And that's it :p No multiplayer, etc. Just a little taste of the real deal.
data.short_description: The first Level of the campaign. And that's it :p No multiplayer, etc. Just a little taste of the real deal.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: 2Cores 2.0 Ghz 64 bit CPU
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB Video RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Anything made in the last 5 years should do, really.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: 2Cores 3.0 Ghz 64 bit CPU
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB Video RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Anything made in the last 5 years should do, really.

mac_requirements.minimum:

  • OS: OS X El Capitan

  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB Video RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Anything made in the last 5 years should do, really.
